about_the_game:
THE TRIO ARE BACK!!
N00bly, Fart_Garfunkel and POOPLOSER_69 are back in Townington and need your help in this (strictly PG) fan-fiction romantic visual novel.
It's been over 10 years since they've rid the server of former staff member Gaylord_Steambath and now they face their own challenges as they navigate the perils of being server staff. Help them find what they're looking for - and write your own happy ending with each of them.
Explore classic locations from 'The Noob Adventures' minecraft server, and meet characters from the TNA universe!
Includes:
  • Over 30 unique locations around the TNA universe
  • Interactions and unique stories for each of the Trio
  • Special Guest appearances from other characters from the TNA universe
  • Unique art for each happy ending
  • Unique bad endings for each storyline
  • VA from the original series
detailed_description:
THE TRIO ARE BACK!!
N00bly, Fart_Garfunkel and POOPLOSER_69 are back in Townington and need your help in this (strictly PG) fan-fiction romantic visual novel.
It's been over 10 years since they've rid the server of former staff member Gaylord_Steambath and now they face their own challenges as they navigate the perils of being server staff. Help them find what they're looking for - and write your own happy ending with each of them.
Explore classic locations from 'The Noob Adventures' minecraft server, and meet characters from the TNA universe!
Includes:
  • Over 30 unique locations around the TNA universe
  • Interactions and unique stories for each of the Trio
  • Special Guest appearances from other characters from the TNA universe
  • Unique art for each happy ending
  • Unique bad endings for each storyline
  • VA from the original series
legal_notice: Original Series by Jim Schwertfeger / falconer02

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04.4 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: The Noob Adventures: Fool For Love

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX11
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A visual novel set in the world of 'The Noob Adventures'. Meet and talk to your favourite characters in this nostalgic fan-fiction.
